title: Cover Image
content:
The cover image is based on the Research Article Improving aromatic higher alcohol acetates in wines by co-fermentation of Pichia kluyveri and Saccharomyces cerevisiae: growth interaction and amino acid competition by Yueqi Li et al., https://doi.org/10.1002/jsfa.13519.
